meanings.definition: The quality of persisting or continuing to exist.
meanings.sent1: Her persistencies in her studies paid off with excellent grades.
meanings.sent2: The persistencies of the old building amazed the historians.
meanings.sent3: Despite the rain, the persistencies of the little ant to reach its anthill were admirable.
meanings.sent4: The persistencies of the sun to rise every morning is a natural wonder.
meanings.sent5: The persistencies of the clock ticking reminded him of the passing time.

meanings.definition: The act of persisting or refusing to give up.
meanings.sent1: His persistencies in negotiations led to a successful deal.
meanings.sent2: The persistencies of the marathon runner inspired the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The persistencies of the toddler to tie his shoelaces were both cute and determined.
meanings.sent4: The persistencies of the river to carve through the rock symbolized determination.
meanings.sent5: The persistencies of the detective in solving the case were commendable.

meanings.definition: The state of being persistent or determined.
meanings.sent1: The persistencies of the team to win the championship were evident in their hard work.
meanings.sent2: Her persistencies in achieving her goals motivated those around her.
meanings.sent3: The persistencies of the squirrel to get the nut up the tree provided entertainment for the onlookers.
meanings.sent4: The persistencies of the wind to sway the trees showed its unwavering nature.
meanings.sent5: The persistencies of the student to improve his grades were truly inspiring.
